content:
Yes, the Nigerian music industry has seen the rise of several new artists who have made a significant impact recently. Some of the most prominent new artists in Nigeria include:

1. Omah Lay: Omah Lay, a singer, and songwriter, rose to fame in 2020 with his debut EP "Get Layd." His unique blend of Afrobeat and R&B has gained him a massive following both locally and internationally.

2. Tems: Tems is a talented singer and songwriter who gained popularity with her hit song "Mr Rebel." Her unique style of music has made her a top contender in the Nigerian music scene.

3. Bella Shmurda: Bella Shmurda is a singer, rapper and songwriter who first gained fame with his hit single 'Vision 2020'. He has gone on to collaborate with several top Nigerian artists, including Olamide and Davido.

4. Joeboy: Joeboy is a singer and songwriter who burst into the Nigerian music scene with his hit single 'Baby'. He has since gone on to release other hit songs like 'Beginning' and 'Don't call me back'.

These new artists have brought fresh energy and perspective to the Nigerian music industry and are expected to continue making a significant impact in the years to come.
